services.desc: Cloud hosting: a simple cloud hosting to support every user's needs. Dynamic sharable hosting at a very competitive low cost.
Virtual Private Server: providing mid-performance a low prices. This shrable hosting service will fullfil any customer's mediocre needs.
Dedicated hosting: low lentancy and true power-horse performance. This server is dedicated only for your usage with high bandwidth speeds.
Colocation: mass data storage providing confort and reliability for any occasion. Memorial pictures of your family or your latest business backups.
